description.en: Overview of the development of theatre and drama concentrating on different countries (English, American, French etc) and theatre styles and theories (theatre of the absurd, Grotowski's poor theatre, intercultural theatre etc).
description.et:
Ülevaade perioodi teatri ja draama arengust kesksemate maade kaupa (inglise, ameerika, prantsuse teater jne) ja teatrivormide ning -teooriate kaupa (absurditeater, Grotowski vaene teater,
interkultuuriline teater jne).

objectives.en: Give an overview of theatre history in Europe and North-America during the second half of the 20th century.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade Euroopa ja Põhja-Ameerika teatri ja draama arengusuundadest 20.sajandi teisest poolest tänapäevani.

learning_outcomes.en:
1. The student has an overview of the development of European and North-American theatre during the period 1940-2010
2. The student is able to name and describe the most important theatres and directors from the period
3. Knows the avangarde theoretical thought from the period
4. Is able to analyze the esthetics of the performances seen in video.
